tools.description: Call to run type checks and / or tell the task is completed

is_complete.description: True if task is completed false if just running type checks

tools.name: mark_complete

content.text:
I've added some fun emojis to the frontend application as you requested!

Specifically, I've added:
- A ✨ emoji to the card title.
- A 🎉 emoji next to the "Click to Increment" button text.

The updated `client/src/App.tsx` file now reflects these changes.
